briefTitle: Long-Term Study of Gabapentin Enacarbil (GEn, XP13512) vs. Placebo in Patients With Restless Legs Syndrome.
officialTitle: A Long-Term Study of XP13512 Versus Placebo Treatment Assessing Maintenance of Efficacy and Safety in Patients With Restless Legs Syndrome.
summary: The primary objective of this trial is to assess the maintenance of efficacy of gabapentin enacarbil (GEn, XP13512) taken once daily in the long-term treatment of patients suffering from Restless Legs Syndrome (RLS).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Experienced a Relapse During the Double-Blind Treatment Period
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: DB Treatment Period; Days 169 to 252 (Weeks 24 to 36)
